ifcookie.description: Evaluate a block when the specified cookie is set.

attributes.name: The name of the cookie.
attributes.key: Set the value of get cookie to variable(default value is 'cookie_val').
attributes.(note): Tag attributes for comparison of mt:if tag can be used.

setcookie.description: Set the cookie value. When using https access, the secure flag is automatically assigned.

attributes.name: The name of the cookie.
attributes.path: The path on the server in which the cookie will be available on(default value is '/').
attributes.expires: The time the cookie expires(default value is '86400' *the value of environment variable 'sess_timeout').
attributes.httponly: When specified the cookie will be made accessible only through the HTTP protocol(The cookie won't be accessible by JavaScript).
attributes.reload: Reload the page after setting the cookie.
